affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: Rubick uses his telekinetic powers to lift the enemy into the air briefly and then hurls them back at the ground. The unit lands on the ground with such force that it stuns nearby enemies.
notes:
While the target is in the air, Rubick may use a secondary ability to throw the enemy in a targeted direction.
When the unit lands, it isn't affected by the area of effect stun.
The farthest you can throw an enemy is 375.
cmb:
120/120/120/120
22
lore: Even the Grandest Magus may use his powers for enjoyment.
name: rubick_telekinesis

desc: Chooses the location the target will land when Telekinesis finishes.
name: rubick_telekinesis_land

affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: Rubick creates a powerful stream of arcane energy that travels between enemy units, dealing damage and reducing their attack damage.  Each jump deals less damage.
attrib:
DAMAGE: 70/140/210/280
JUMP REDUCTION: 4%/4%/4%/4%
HERO DAMAGE REDUCTION: 14/20/26/32
CREEP DAMAGE REDUCTION: 7/10/13/16
DEBUFF DURATION: 10/10/10/10
cmb:
120/130/140/150
16/14/12/10
lore: Rubick's favorite spell for dispatching would-be assassins is a rather simple conjuration.
name: rubick_fade_bolt

desc: Rubick's mastery of the arcane protects nearby allies against weaker magics, granting them magic resistance.
notes: Stacks multiplicatively with other spell resistance sources.
lore: Not every magus can be a Grand Magus...
name: rubick_null_field

affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Heroes
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
desc:
Rubick studies the trace magical essence of one enemy hero, learning the secrets of the last spell the hero cast. Rubick can use this spell as his own for several minutes or until he dies.
Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
cmb:
25/25/25
20/18/16
lore: ...but even their lesser magics can be a source of much utility.
name: rubick_spell_steal
